trans-unit.source: Specifies that a control can be in a certain state and that a <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref> is expected in the control's <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que um controlo pode ser num determinado Estado e que um <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"> </xref> é esperado o controlo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Control authors use this attribute to specify the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> and <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> objects that belong in their control's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Os autores de controlo utilizam este atributo para especificar os <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>objetos que pertencem os respetivos controlo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> e</xref:System.Windows.VisualState>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that you create a new control that has two visual states named `Focused` and `Unfocused`, both of which are in a <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> named `FocusStates`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que crie um novo controlo que tem dois Estados visual com o nome `Focused` e `Unfocused`, ambos os de que estão a ser um <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>denominado `FocusStates`.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>

trans-unit.source: To specify to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> authors that they can use those visual states, add two TemplateVisualStateAttribute attributes to the class signature of the control.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>autores que pode utilizar os Estados de visual, adicionar dois atributos TemplateVisualStateAttribute à assinatura da classe do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Specify that the <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A> property is `FocusStates` and that the <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.Name%2A> property is `Focused` for one and `Unfocused` for the other.
trans-unit.target: Especificar que o <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A>propriedade é `FocusStates` e de que o <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.Name%2A>propriedade é `Focused` para um e `Unfocused` ao outro.</xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the group that the state belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do grupo que pertence o estado.

trans-unit.source: The GroupName property corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> object.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade GroupName corresponde do <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To specify what <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> a <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> belongs in, set the GroupName property.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar que <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>um <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>pertence, defina a propriedade GroupName.</xref:System.Windows.VisualState> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup"></xref> that the state belongs to.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup"> </xref> que pertence o estado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the state that the control can be in.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do Estado que pode ser o controlo.

trans-unit.source: The Name property corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de nome corresponde à <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>.</xref:System.Windows.VisualState> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To specify what <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> belongs in a control's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, set the Name property.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar que <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>pertence um controlo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, defina a propriedade Name.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState>

trans-unit.source: The name of the state that the control can be in.
trans-unit.target: O nome do Estado que pode ser o controlo.
